Guaranteed Rate Field

About

Guaranteed Rate Field is located on the South Side of Chicago, Illinois. Guaranteed Rate Field is the home of the Chicago White Sox and occasionally hosts concerts in thesummertime. The most recent concert hosted here was Chance the Rapper in 2016.

Guranteed Rate Field offers a number of services to people with disabilities. Below is a list of some of the services they offer that can found on their website.

  • Accessible Parking
  • Assistive Listening Devices
  • Accessible Seating
  • Elevators
  • Wheelchairs

More Information

For more information on accessibilty services at Guranteed Rate Field visit their website at the link below.

  • Guranteed Rate Field Accessibility
